description: This file demonstrates how to create an AI-powered news reporter agent with web search capabilities, tailored to deliver news with a New York City personality. It sets up an agent with specific instructions, tools, and example usage for real-time news reporting.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that manages AI model interactions and instructions.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and stream a response based on a prompt.
